txt.en: 'Are you handy at crafting things, [placeholder]? I will trade you Motes of Enchantment for them, as my rations allow.'\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>This quest can be turned in once per week.</rgb>
Craft worthy items and exchange them for Motes of Enchantment at a Mote and Ember Trader in Bree, Galtrev, the Twenty-first Hall, or Mózhek near the Stable-master in Skarháld.
'Are you handy at crafting things, [placeholder]? I will trade you Motes of Enchantment for them, as my rations allow.'\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>This quest can be turned in once per week.</rgb>
'Are you handy at crafting things, [placeholder]? I will trade you Motes of Enchantment for them, as my rations allow.'\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>This quest can be turned in once per week.</rgb>
Bring a Mote and Ember Trader [placeholder] Mote-worthy crafts
'Are you handy at crafting things, [placeholder]? I will trade you Motes of Enchantment for them, as my rations allow.'\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>This quest can be turned in once per week.</rgb>
'Why look at this craft-work. These will serve us well, take my word.'\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>The quantity of Mote-worthy crafts will be removed from your inventory.</rgb>
